members.name: isScreenReaderRunning
members.description: Makes an asynchronous call to native MobileAccessibility to determine if a screen reader is running.

members.name: isVoiceOverRunningCallback
members.description: An iOS-specific proxy for the MobileAccessibility.isScreenReaderRunning method

members.name: isTalkBackRunningCallback
members.description: An Android/Amazon Fire OS-specific proxy for the MobileAccessibility.isScreenReaderRunning method.

members.name: isChromeVoxActive
members.description: On Android, this method returns true if ChromeVox is active and properly initialized with access to the text to speech API in the WebView.If TalkBack is running but ChromeVox is not active, this method is useful to alert the user of a potential problem.

params.name: textZoom
params.description: A percentage value by which text in the WebView should be scaled.

members.name: usePreferredTextZoom
members.description: A Boolean value which specifies whether to use the preferred text zoom of a default percent value of 100.

members.name: postNotification
members.description: Posts a notification with a string for the screen reader to announce if it is running.

params.name: value
params.description: A string to be announced by a screen reader.

members.name: speak
members.description: Speaks a given string through the screenreader. On Android, if ChromeVox is active, it will use the specified queueMode and properties.
